data.comment: Oostende kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Gent take a 0-1 lead thanks to Osman Bukari.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Ari Skulason (Oostende) gets a yellow card.
Lothar D Hondt blows to start the second-half. Gent with the kick-off.
In the minute 59, Makhtar Gueye (Oostende) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Makhtar Gueye (Oostende) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Ostend.
The away team replace Jordan Botaka with Laurent Depoitre.
In the minute 67, Osman Bukari (Gent) has received a yellow card from Lothar D Hondt.
Oostende have been given a penalty...
It's advantage Oostende in Ostend as Fashion Sakala scores from the spot to make it 2-1.
In the minute 77, Sindri Guri is on a sub for Fashion Sakala for Oostende.
Gent make their second substitution with Roman Bezus replacing Elisha Owusu.
Francois Marquet is replacing Andrew Hjulsager for Oostende at Diaz Arena.
In the minute 89, Nurio Fortuna (Gent) has received a first yellow card.
That's full-time at Diaz Arena. The final score is 2-1.
At Diaz Arena, Roman Bezus has been yellow-carded for the away team.
